627430.name: Redout - V.E.R.T.E.X. Pack
627430.description:
V.E.R.T.E.X. Pack

Join the Virtual Environment for Redout Training EXperience, the ultimate and most original racing battlefield! This new virtual arena is the zen heaven of the best SRRL pilots and will test your ability to master seemingly simple paths, to top the global leaderboards!

V.E.R.T.E.X. Pack adds:
- The V.E.R.T.E.X. Environment, with 5 shiny new tracks and a new challenging boss track;
- Two new unlocked liveries for each team - that's 48 new unlocked liveries;
- Ten brand new career events.

Multiplayer

In multiplayer games, only the host needs to own the DLC to let anyone race on the V.E.R.T.E.X.!
627430.supported_languages:
英语*, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 法语, 德语, 俄语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
